Manifest.name: DTEC - Smart Voice Assistant Platform
Manifest.description: All-in-One Smart Voice Assistants. Experience the future of mobility with car, home, shopping and travel assistants.

shortcuts.homeAssistantDesc: Control your home with voice commands

Hero.title: Journey to the Future
Hero.description: Your All-in-One Smart Voice Assistant Solution

Dtec AI Call Center.title: Dtec AI Call Center
Dtec AI Call Center.description: Our Dtec AI Call Center solution revolutionizes customer experience by managing incoming and outgoing calls without human intervention!
Dtec AI Call Center.sectionTitle: The Future of Call Experience Has Started.
Dtec AI Call Center.sectionDescription: Revolutionize customer service with our AI-powered call center solution. DtecAI automatically manages incoming and outgoing calls, provides personalized service and Provides uninterrupted support 24/7.

f1.title: Intelligent Call Answering
f1.description: Correctly route and instantly resolve every call.

f4.title: Continuously Learning Intelligence
f4.description: A system that evolves with every interaction.

scalability.title: Scalable Structure
scalability.description: DtecAI can be flexibly adapted to any scale, from small teams to global operations. It responds to growing needs without the need for additional development.

security.title: Corporate Security Standards
security.description: All communication and transaction records are encrypted and stored in accordance with international security standards. DtecAI takes your data privacy seriously.

howItWorks.title: How Does It Work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Be present wherever your customers are with DtecAI.

col1.title: Instant Detection and Routing
points: When a customer calls you, DtecAI automatically answers the call.
Analyzes the caller's needs in seconds.
Offers or routes the most accurate answer based on the topic.

col2.title: Listen, Understand and Respond with Artificial Intelligence
points: Understands what the customer says and wants with NLP technology.
Offers a human-like, natural and fluent conversational experience.
Learns from every interaction and responds more accurately in the future.

col3.title: Efficient, Measurable and Always Ready
points: Calls such as appointment reminders, campaigns and surveys are carried out autonomously.
No incoming call goes unanswered by providing 24/7 service.
Reduces operational costs, increases customer satisfaction.

automation.title: Automatic Process Flows
automation.description: Say goodbye to manual processes. E-mail, SMS or CRM entries triggered after each interaction with the customer are completely automated. Save time, reduce the margin of error.

Ecosystem.title: Ekosistem
Ecosystem.description: Thanks to its advanced natural language processing capabilities and high-level artificial intelligence features, Dtec not only understands the driver's voice commands, but also perceives the driver's mood, anticipates their needs and desires, and provides early solutions and services thanks to its built-in autonomous learning system and emotional consensus mechanism.

Dtec Assistants.title: Dtec Assistants
Dtec Assistants.description:
All-in-one intelligent voice assistants:
Guidance with every command, comfort with every step.

car.title: Dtec Vehicle Assistant
car.description: It allows you to talk to vehicles as if there was a person in front of you. It interacts with you with voice recognition technology and quickly fulfills the information or commands you want.

shopping.title: Dtec Shopping Assistant
shopping.description: It is a shopping assistant that everyone can easily shop on e-commerce platforms by talking

home.title: Dtec Smart Home Assistant
home.description: Specializes in data analysis, device management and user experience optimization by working with IoT devices.

f1.title: Natural Language Understanding (NLU)
f1.description: Speech understanding for intuitive user communication, context-rich interactions

f2.title: Multimodal Interaction
f2.description: Seamless transitions of voice, text, and visuals for flexible user interaction

f3.title: Personalization and User Identification
f3.description: Learn and remember user preferences by tailoring responses to personalized interactions

f4.title: Integration with Third-Party Services
f4.description: Connect to various services by creating a central hub for convenience

f5.title: Context-Aware Task Continuity
f5.description: Context-aware for smooth interactions, reducing the need for repetition protect

limitations.l1: Basic and static reactions and responses.

TokenSection.header: Experience the Future of Mobility with Dtec Token!
TokenSection.description: Dtec Token enables application control via voice commands via the blockchain-powered Dtec Assistant. Tokens are earned when the vehicle is charged or the assistant is used. These rewards can be spent freely within the system and used to create value. Mobility is now smarter, more profitable and more personal thanks to real-time data, artificial intelligence and secure blockchain integration.

feature_1.title: Voice Command Access
feature_1.description: Instant voice access to IoT devices and applications.

feature_2.title: Artificial Intelligence Integration
feature_2.description: Assistant-powered, continuously evolving smart mobility ecosystem.

feature_3.title: Personalized Experience
feature_3.description: Dynamic optimization based on driving habits.

feature_4.title: Token Earning
feature_4.description: Earn tokens with charging transactions and assistant interactions, spend them however you want.

feature_5.title: Real-Time Data
feature_5.description: Efficient mobility with instant route and driving insights.

feature_6.title: Blockchain Assurance
feature_6.description: Blockchain's transparent, secure and traceable transaction infrastructure.
